actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to change the minimum disability rating a veteran must have in order to receive additional compensation for dependents from 30 per centum to 10 per centum.

summary.text: Reduces the minimum disability rating a veteran receiving wartime disability compensation must have in order to receive additional compensation for dependents from 30 percent to ten percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to change the minimum disability rating a veteran must have in order to receive additional compensation for dependents from 30 per centum to 10 per centum.
